body_html:
Also seems to break the build:

09:14:45 + python build.py
09:14:45 ~/workspace/extension-ffi/script ~/workspace
09:14:45 Traceback (most recent call last):
09:14:45   File "build.py", line 2, in <module>
09:14:45     import torch
09:14:45   File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 78, in <module>
09:14:45     from torch._C import *
09:14:45 ImportError: /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: _ZN4gloo28CudaAllreduceHalvingDoublingIfNS_17CudaHostWorkspaceIfEEE3runEv

body:
Also seems to break the build:

```
09:14:45 + python build.py
09:14:45 ~/workspace/extension-ffi/script ~/workspace
09:14:45 Traceback (most recent call last):
09:14:45   File "build.py", line 2, in <module>
09:14:45     import torch
09:14:45   File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 78, in <module>
09:14:45     from torch._C import *
09:14:45 ImportError: /opt/conda/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: _ZN4gloo28CudaAllreduceHalvingDoublingIfNS_17CudaHostWorkspaceIfEEE3runEv
```
